\SetAPI{J}
\section{audit.servicearg.defaultmode.active}
\label{configuration:AuditServiceargDefaultmodeActive}
\ClearAPI
Defines the default behavior for handling the arguments in audit entries of service calls if the argument is not annotated with {@link AuditedArg}. If set to "true" the arguments of service calls are added to the audit entry by default, otherwise the text "n/a" is set. Valid values are "true" and "false".

\begin{lstlisting}[style=Props,caption={Usage example for \textit{audit.servicearg.defaultmode.active}}]

\end{lstlisting}
